Introduction

The Gloss (Korean: 더 글로스) was a girl group under MGMC Korea Limited. They debuted on November 25, 2013 with the single album ‘Fantastic. The Gloss was the first K-POP girl group to have a non-Asian member. They consisted of 3 members: Olivia, Grace and Liz. The group unfortunately disbanded on February 24, 2014 when the company announced the girls would be doing ‘individual activities’.
